name: BigPatience HD Lite
description:
Play Klondike, Gaps and Trial solitaire games with the beautiful Antic deck!

The game features include:
* customizing solitaire rules;
* unlimited undo and redo;
* 3 changeable decks;
* zooming feature;
* favorites and recent game lists;
* game statistics;
* the detailed help.

After unlocking the full version, you will have:
* 60 popular and unique solitaire games;
* 16 beautiful decks;
* large selection of backs and backgrounds.
